channel.title: We need more customization options!
channel.description: Personally, I have 6600 coins and I think this is a problem because I play TOL and I have no use for coins. There is 2 courses of action either A) make the amount of coins one receives less so the user has to play more games to buy something making the lobbies more full and the wait time decrease and or B) creating more customization options which also motivates the user to play more matches which in pat decreases the lobby wait time.

item.title: We need more customization options!
item.dc:creator: Crimson
item.description:
Here some of my ideas for customs and cosmetics

  • Custom death notes (like a papyrus death note or wood death note…)
  • Custom colors
  • Emote like war cry or raise up our equipped weapon…
  • Different type of font (not shitty font)
  • Titles like “The bloodthirsty -Crimson-” (but not in game, imo titles should be seen a the end of a game and in lobby and also friend list.
  • Some hats !
    And also Achievements, like as a Hunter : “Kill the king with your arrow” and some of the achievements will unlock titles or different cosmetic as a reward

Not sure if all of this can be good idea or not but maybe this gonna inspire you for other idea !
